name: Cottage Disaster
description:
CottageJam 2022 Entry

Tower defense game where your plants shoot bugs that trying to invade your house, but you are a farmer so you also sell your plants. Will you be able to maintain balance between your money and defense power?

Duhan Durmaz - Pixel Art

Selim Agacan - Coding

Bahadir Dogan - Pixel Art

Kardelen Erdinc - Music&SFX

Kivanc Yucel - Pixel Art
